hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Ya ha ha! You found me!

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Light Arrows# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Purple Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #5# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Lullaby Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Zora Shop#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Big Poe Bottle#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
